description: two oval portrait busts: John van Belcamp facing left, looking toward viewer has long curly hair; George Geldorp facing right looking at viewer; swag in upper left corner; rose garland upper right with bow
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

on sheet in black: [Vol 2. 101/ Bannerman sculp/JOHN VAN BELCAMP/ GELDORP]; on sheet in pencil: [1-505/ The only portraits of these artists/ Bromley p.105]
title: Portraits of John van Belcamp and George Geldorp
